data.message: Mine sucked thanks Facebook for some of my bad memories

replies.message: Hey Cory. We're rolling out the edit feature slowly for the Look Back videos. You'll soon be able to select better photos for your video. Thanks for your patience! -Leigh
really? well thank u then:)
I don't care what people say about you Facebook, you're alright in my book ^.^

wow... that's so cool.  i liked mine very much, but was a bit bummed it included a photo of my deceased sister but not a photo of my deceased niece.  so cool to read that an edit is coming which might allow me to include a photo of her.

ty
Thanks, Ice-king. We think you're alright too! -Kristen
Hey C Cecilia. We're sorry for your loss and also sorry to hear the photos didn't include both your niece and nephew. Hang tight as we roll out the edit feature! -Kristen
So what about those that did not get a video FACEBOOK ????? You treating people different and advertising they get a video when the don't... YOU SUCK
Facebook doesn't suck .. if you hate Facebook so much then log out get a life. enough said.
Facebook, loved your look back videos.  THANKS.
Hey. Dear Mark Zuckerberg. Is it true that you share our private informations with government ?
My daughter passed away in September of 2012. She has a memorialized Facebook page. How can I get a loopback video for her? It would mean so much to her family.
Tetzu Ichiro....I have a life.. I just think if Facebook says you get a video...EVERYONE should get a video...just as they say...FACEBOOK LIED.
Yes they let me edit mine too!
off topic but bring back the "STOP NOTIFICATIONS" feature on the computer and expand it to mobile app!!!!!!!!
thank you !! I love it .
I hated mine, too.  It used a lot of inanimate objects instead of family.  Facebook doesn't know me at all.
I thought of that too, Digi Doll!
Feel so bad for the bad that got theirs, I still haven't had mine activated yet.
I did not get a Facebook Video also, just got the t pictures.  What else can be done to get the Video?

كل عضو أو زائر لصفحتنا كن سخيا و شارك حب الجزائر مع أصدقائك !
ساعد في نشر الصفحة الأمر سهل و مجاني 
قائمة الاصدقاء على اليمين عليك فقط توجيه الدعوات !
تفضل مشكورا غير مأمور .
zhdc.it
